template.name: rscon
template.value:
from redis import StrictRedis
db_port = '' db_ip = '' db_password = ''
def redis_connection(): db = StrictRedis(host=db_ip, port=db_port) if len(db_password) != 0:
db = StrictRedis(host=db_ip, port=db_port,password=db_password)
return db

template.name: mogo
template.value:
from pymongo import MongoClient
db_ip = '' db_port = '' db_username = '' db_password = ''
def mongo_conection(): db = MongoClient(host=db_ip,port=db_port) if len(db_username) != 0: db = db.admin db.authenticate(db_username,db_password) return db
return db
